text: American club if im around there or nearby i take..i concentrate more to cbd / chinatown..the people are friendly and dont give you attitude..
I 1st time pick up cage iguana the sup or manager give me drink as i waited for 10mina for the order..

Saturday I took 1. He expect me to deliver to customer in 15 mins. He say Orchard to River Valley very fast. He say he do Lalamove before so he know. End up the condo have long queue of cars going in and waited to clear customs. Keep calling me to kpkb.
After everything done   he call me say “thank you” because I deliver 40 mins  he kena have to pay for the member order $90. Say I’m best Lalamove driver and hang up on me.
He should send himself since he do b4... N so confident

First weekend of heightened alert. I explained to him he cannot accept. But when I told the customer about it  she understand and say her condo always like this. Many cars. I suspect American club fella make a mistake or prepare order late  so I have to “help” him settle ASAP.
The condo one by one check car and that idiot keep calling and asking. What can I do? Jump queue meh?
Haish..oddle order is the best ..u sent within the time frame bo taichi..
But oodle famous for double book
U late 5-10mins also no issue..cust also not angry
But oddle can't give u good review aso even if u send fast
Talk about oodle. I took one on Friday. Tell me collect Little India banana leaf
Hope that order i did the SOP of loading when they late..
The one that tio summon and holding 40pax party..
I call. No answer. Lalamove cs  I had to wait 30 mins to get through
But the oodle order is tell me go there collect.
The customer also stun. Ask me try if can get race course road to prepare the order. I say not like that one lah. Cannot suka suka change location.
End up cancel order get 50% back
Place kena forced closure. Oodle also never update customer
6pm I call customer. I think the customer end up eat very late. Order anything at that hour  sure damn long one to deliver
Why some order got heart shape one?
You have priority for heart shape

Drive safe!
